title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: WIRED Roundup: How Charlie Kirk Changed Conservative Media
items.description: On this episode of "Uncanny Valley," we discuss the legacy of Charlie Kirk and the aftermath of his murder.

items.title: Turn Your Old Tech Into Art—Now With a 20% Discount
items.description: Grid Studio is celebrating its 5th anniversary with a 20 percent off sitewide sale. Its art pieces include deconstructed iPhones, Game Boys, and even ...

items.title: The Top New Features in Apple WatchOS 26
items.description: Apple’s new additions this year include a wrist-flick gesture to dismiss a call and a personalized Workout Buddy to tell you when you “crushed it.”

items.title: Company that owns Gucci, Balenciaga, other brands confirms hack
items.description: Kering said the hackers did not steal credit card numbers and that it has contacted the customers whose data is part of the breach, without saying how...

items.title: Robinhood plans to launch a startups fund open to all retail investors
items.description: The “Robinhood Ventures Fund I” is intended to allow any retail investor to make money on startups, but the details are scant.

items.title: Divergent raises $290M to expand production of specialized military parts
items.description: Divergent Technologies' new round will help the company expand its manufacturing footprint across the U.S.

items.title: Apple MacOS Tahoe 26: Top New Features to Try Today
items.description: MacOS Tahoe 26 brings a slew of new features, from a dedicated Games app to a revamped Spotlight function. You can now try them out for yourself.

items.title: With no DOJ breakup, Alphabet becomes a $3 trillion company
items.description: Investors continue to reward Alphabet's stock after a judge declined to break up Google earlier this month.

items.title: The 9 most sought-after startups from YC Demo Day
items.description: We asked YC-focused investors to name the startups from the Summer 2025 batch that generated the most interest.

items.title: Save $40 on a Handmade Dutch Coffeemaker That's Built for Life
items.description: Handmade in the Netherlands, the Moccamaster will kickstart your morning for years to come.
